ComicInfo.Title: The First Course Part 1 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary: The First Course Part 1 of 5: Saffron Chu and her partner, Eddie Molay, are part of a heist of of a criminal boss money stash that goes horribly wrong. Unfortunately her brother, Tony Chu, is one of the cops assigned to the case.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 22:11:51. [CVDB781667] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 05:08:42. [Issue ID 2128494]
